entry.title: New to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: LapineDoodle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,970Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: So what if it's impulsive to move thousands of miles from home to New Jersey of all place? Gotham rent is cheap and have better public infrastructure despite the high crime rate. And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: A God's Fury and A Shattered Knight
entry.summary:
Author: Torched22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,836Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Hearing Batman's terrified screams, Superman races to Gotham and discovers a brutal scene of assault. Overwhelmed by rage, Kal-El enacts swift and deadly vengeance on the attackers, violating his own moral principles. Now there's no turning back; Superman has killed, and just as bad, he has no idea how to begin to help Bruce heal.

entry.title: A Slight Routine Deviation
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,778Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 85

Summary: “I didn’t realize the Daily Planet had an arts section.” Clark smiled despite himself. “We don’t. But Wayne Enterprises is the largest donor for this exhibit, and Perry wants a comment.” Bruce hummed in mock understanding. “Of course. Strictly business.” His gaze flickered over Clark, the corner of his mouth twitching. “And here I thought you came all this way just to see me.” Clark and Bruce have a routine when their paths cross at social events—get a quote, catch up, flirt until Clark gets flustered. But Clark’s getting tired of too much flirting and not enough kissing.(Shamelessly inspired by these @waveoftheocean's two pieces (1) (2) on tumblr.)

entry.title: No Longer You
entry.summary:
Author: NFx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,677Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Despite their differences, despite the devouring guilt in Bruce’s eyes whenever he witnessed the cruelty of his actions in Clark’s psyche, they grew into something more. Bruce provided him with the stability and familiar comfort of belonging- of family, and Clark...Clark became a tender distraction. He brought forward a fundamental change in the bleakness of Bruce’s soul. Once more; a colleague. A friend. A companion, and a partner of day and night.And yet, despite everything, they were not meant to last.

entry.title: The List
entry.summary:
Author: Butterfly_Wordsmith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,008Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Batman really thought he was doing the right thing when he came up with The List, a written document for each member of the Justice League to pre-approve a list of people to have sex with should they ever be under the influence of sex-pollen or any similar circumstance which would put them in a fuck or die situation.He just never expected to be on so many people's lists. Nor did he expect to be called upon so often- or to have so many feelings about it.Neither did Clark, who wants more than just a turn to be saved by Batman's sexual availability- something so obvious to the rest of the League it's almost painful.

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,233Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 65

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,967Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,356Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 60

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,104Chapters: 1/9Kudos: 16

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: strike up the band and make the fireflies dance
entry.summary:
Author: ok_this_is_love

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,274Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 99

Summary: Clark opens his eyes. His gaze meets Bruce’s--blue and burning, like some small ember has sparked in the space between them.Bruce swallows.And then Clark trips.It happens so suddenly that Bruce barely has time to react. Clark stumbles over his own feet, arms flailing for balance, and Bruce moves instinctively--his grip tightening, pulling Clark against him before they can both go crashing to the floor.
